ack.p: We would like to thank Daniela Buntefuß, Marco Friedrich, Janine Gabler, Brigitte Huemer, Sabrina Kettenbach, Christoph Schühlmann, and the Sangamo Production group for excellent technical assistance, Edward Rebar, Beilin Zhang and Jeffrey Miller for assistance with ZFN design, and Nicole Schüler and Frederic Schultz for expert work in cloning the DNA vector for targeted gene replacement. We also thank Fyodor Urnov for editorial input and Susan Abrahamson for helpful comments on the manuscript.
